com.keyboardr.glassremote.server

Class StringMessageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • com.keyboardr.glassremote.server.MessageService<String,String>
        • com.keyboardr.glassremote.server.StringMessageService

  • public abstract class StringMessageService
extends MessageService<String,String>
    Sends and receives String messages with a remote client. This service must be running in order for a remote client to connect.

    Note: Messages are separated by '\n' characters
    Author:
    Joshua Brown

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description

      Class constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StringMessageService

        protected StringMessageService(String name,
                    UUID uuid)
        Class constructor. Concrete implementations must have a zero-argument constructor.
        Parameters:
        name - service name for SDP record
        uuid - a UUID shared between the remote client and this server. UUIDs can be obtained at http ://www.uuidgenerator.net/ and instantiated using UUID.fromString(String).
